articles.description: Notre Dame coach Niele Ivey has been exactly where star point guard Olivia Miles is now -- sitting on the sideline with a knee injury, unable to play in the biggest games of the season.
articles.content: GREENVILLE, S.C. -- Notre Dame coach Niele Ivey has been exactly where star point guard Olivia Miles is now -- sitting on the sideline with a knee injury, unable to play in the biggest games of the s… [+3696 chars]
